35234.affected_area: Richmond (North of Green Acres Golf course)
live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
We continue to work in the area on a fix for this outage. There is no ETA until the resolution.

35234.summary: Some customers in the area North of Greenacres Golf Course in Richmond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35234.title: Mar 22 - Richmond (North of Green Acres Golf course) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
